limitedTime.name: Shiba Arcade
limitedTime.description: Make a game with Godot, earn SSS, and get invited to build an arcade in Tokyo (flight stipends available!)
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Shiba is a two-part adventure about game development. Create a game with Godot (an open-source game engine), earn SSS, use that for shop items, but most importantly, an invitation (and flight stipends) to Tokyo, Japan with 29 other Hack Clubbers to build a pop-up arcade!

limitedTime.name: Siege
limitedTime.description: Code every week, get prizes. Make it to the end, get a framework!

limitedTime.name: Waveform
limitedTime.description: Make your own waveform visualizer, get a grant to buy music

limitedTime.name: birthday-cards
limitedTime.description: You ship a birthday themed project we ship a birthday card!

limitedTime.name: HackCraft
limitedTime.description: Create a Minecraft mod, get Stickers, Minecraft or a server and terraria!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Join HackCraft to build and ship your own Minecraft mod. Access exclusive resources and a supportive community.
steps: Submit your mod to Hack Club.
details: Participants will receive a Minecraft Java Edition account or server upon successful submission.
Support is available through our Slack community.

limitedTime.name: Penumbra
limitedTime.description: Make shaders, and we'll ship you GPUs and posters!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Penumbra is a YSWS, where you create shaders on ShaderToy, and get posters of your shaders shipped right to your doorstep! If you spend up to 45 hours across multiple ships, you'll be able to get a GPU like an RTX 3050!

limitedTime.name: Clutter
limitedTime.description: You ship something to organize your digital life. We ship you a grant to buy something to organize your physical life.

limitedTime.name: Fusering
limitedTime.description: Design a keyring, get your keyring and a carabiner to hang it from!

limitedTime.name: iFrame
limitedTime.description: Draw or edit images using any programming language and we will hang your custom image on HQ wall and send a copy to you

limitedTime.name: Silicon
limitedTime.description: Design your own custom devboard and we'll fund it

limitedTime.name: BakeBuild
limitedTime.description: Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship : A CAD model of a cookie cutter, we ship : A 3D printed model of your custom cookie cutter & cookies!

limitedTime.name: Solder
limitedTime.description: Design and solder your own custom PCB with a free electronics kit!

limitedTime.name: cmd + k
limitedTime.description: Build a Raycast extension, get Raycast Pro & stickers

indefinite.name: Sprig
indefinite.description: Build a JS game and play it on your own console.

indefinite.name: OnBoard
indefinite.description: Design a PCB and we'll fabricate it for you.

indefinite.name: Boba Drops
indefinite.description: Build a website and get boba!

indefinite.name: OnBoard Live
indefinite.description: Design a PCB live on YouTube for $5/hour PCB credit.

ended.name: Armed
ended.description: Develop an arm assembly program, get lego.

ended.name: The Zoo
ended.description: Make an animal themed Svelte site, earn Ikea Animal Plushies
ended.detailedDescription: The Zoo is a Svelte YSWS where participants build an animal themed Svelte site and earn Mynts (currency) which can be turned into an HCB grant at the end to buy Ikea plushies. Get one giant Djungleskog, or multiple mini Blahaj, it's all up to you. Here's the best part: the better your submission is, the more Mynts you earn!

ended.name: Hivemind
ended.description: Create a roguelike in 7 days, get itch.io credit.
steps: Create a traditional roguelike in 7 days.
Get $2.50 in itch.io credit for each approved hour you spend.

ended.name: Authly
ended.description: Build the weirdest and never-before-seen authentication system, get yubikeys, programmable nfc tags, antivirus giftcards and more!

ended.name: Gemini
ended.description: Ship An Android App and get a FREE Android Phone + Dev License!

ended.name: Endpointer
ended.description: Build a REST API, get a grant for Raspberry Pi or Cloud Credits

ended.name: Portal-VR
ended.description: Build an AR/VR application, get a VR headset!

ended.name: Timeless
ended.description: You have 10 days. Make a video game that could last someone 10 years.

ended.name: Toybox
ended.description: You ship a daily game, we ship stickers + keycap keychain + steam gift card. Make the next Wordle.

ended.name: Dummies
ended.description: learn a new language, recieve a guide book!
ended.detailedDescription: Join Dummies to take on projects in new languages and earn grant cards for books!
requirements: resulting project can be seen from a weblink

ended.name: Twist
ended.description: Make an esolang, get stickers and a $40 electronics grant.

ended.name: Terminal Craft v3
ended.description: Build and publish your own terminal program and earn a $60 grant

ended.name: Slushies
ended.description: Build a flask app, get $5 or $10 for slushies!

ended.name: Infinity
ended.description: Build a website with an infinite realtime canvas, get awesome prizes!

ended.name: Tile
ended.description: Build a tile, get a tile, tile the tiles!

ended.name: Minigame
ended.description: A YSWS where you build "mini" 5 hour games and earn a $20 grant for each one! At the end everyone's games will be combined together to make a big Minigame collection!

ended.name: Squeak
ended.description: Design a mouse case and receive the case and parts!

ended.name: Pathfinder
ended.description: Make a custom PCB controller board and efidget

ended.name: Hackfinger
ended.description: You design a custom appendage (finger, tail, leg, anything you want!) and get your design printed along with a custom control board.

ended.name: Jumpstart
ended.description: Game-dev YSWS running July 9th to Aug 9th âœ¨

drafts.name: issued
drafts.detailedDescription: you code to design hack-themed apparel, we ship popular designs as real clothes!

drafts.name: Swatchbox
drafts.description: You ship a modular art component, we ship the swatchbox to go with it!

drafts.name: Poetry
drafts.description: You ship: poetry (details to be decided soon) We ship: Maybe a poster or smth?

drafts.description: DESIGN A PLUNGER-STYLE COOKIE CUTTER, GET IT SHIPPED!

drafts.name: Apogee
drafts.description: a rocketry ysws - still workshopping the idea!

drafts.name: Glossarium
drafts.description: You ship anything that can provide knowledge (a comic, a tutorial, a how-to...) We ship a zine from Julia Evans

drafts.name: Hacksaber
drafts.description: An (not official) YSWS that you make an beat saber mod or custom map and we give beat saber copy
